name: Ocean Colonel: World of Yesterday
desc: After an ally target uses Ultimate, for the next 2 attack(s), deals 1 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 100% of the ally target's ATK to the attacked enemy target.
enhanced_desc: After an ally target uses Ultimate, for the next 2 attack(s), deals 1 instance(s) of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 110% of the ally target's ATK to the attacked enemy target. This instance of Ultimate will also trigger this effect.
